SPECFEM2D

SPECFEM2D allows users to perform 2D and 2.5D (i.e., axisymmetric) simulations of acoustic, elastic, viscoelastic, and poroelastic seismic wave propagation.

View on GitHub

Table of Contents

  • Doing tomography, i.e., updating the model based on the sensitivity kernels obtained

Doing tomography, i.e., updating the model based on the sensitivity kernels obtained

The process is described in the same chapter of the manual of SPECFEM3D. Please refer to it.
